column1: '''''Mythlore'' 47''' (Volume 13, Issue 1) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]]. The issue includes a subject index to the ''[[Tolkien Journal]]''.
*"The Sacred Community of That Hideous Strength"
*"The Epic Hero and Society: Cuchulainn, Beowulf, and Roland"
*"The Feast of Reason: Out of the Silent Planet"
